msItem.title: Divan of Hafiz.
msItem.note: F1a: a) Signature of Mir Bahadur 'Ali in Arabic script. b) signature of W. Francklin First flyleaf, recto: a) Signature of Mir Bahadur 'Ali and date 1804 A.D., in Arabic script. b) Signature of T? Raban. Inside front cover: W. Francklin 1793, scored through. On front cover: Mir Bahadur 'Ali. Ruled margins and dividing panels. Headings in red. With the preface by Muhammad Gulandam
msItem.incipit: Hamd-i bi-hadd wa thana-yi bi-'add wa sipas-i bi-qiyas

bindingDesc.p: Brown leather European-style binding with some painted decoration.

acquisition.p: Presented by Lieutenant Colonel William Francklin.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
